event.title: is believed to be the location of an early settlement in the Savannah area (prior to General Oglethorpe's land grant in 1733

data.event: Montgomery is believed to be the location of an early settlement in the Savannah area (prior to General Oglethorpe's land grant in 1733) founded by three brothers, William, James, and Robert Montgomery, who were baronets, under a land grant of 1677.
